meanings.sent1: Farmers use chlorpyrifoses to protect their crops from harmful bugs.
meanings.sent2: The chlorpyrifoses sprayed on the plants helped get rid of the pesky insects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ants tried to steal the chlorpyrifoses to use as a secret weapon in their ant battles.
meanings.sent4: The chlorpyrifoses acted like a shield, keeping the plants safe from the invading insects.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chlorpyrifoses in the air signaled that the fields were being protected from pests.

meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the effects of different chlorpyrifoses on the environment.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, they tested various chlorpyrifoses to see which one was the most effective.
meanings.sent3: The shelves in the store were stocked with bottles of chlorpyrifoses of all sizes.
meanings.sent4: The chlorpyrifoses in the containers gleamed under the bright lights of the laboratory.
meanings.sent5: Each of the chlorpyrifoses had a unique label indicating its specific use.
